name: Microsoft Whiteboard Document
summary: Learn about .WHITEBOARD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Students, educators, and professionals who need a shared virtual space for brainstorming, planning, or teaching are the primary users of Microsoft Whiteboard. Users typically interact with WHITEBOARD files by opening them with Microsoft Whiteboard, where they can make changes, add content, or collaborate with others in real time. WHITEBOARD files also allow them to continue working on a whiteboard even when offline and provides a way to archive or share complete sessions with others.

instructions: You can open WHITEBOARD files with Microsoft Whiteboard. The app is available on Windows, iOS, Android, and web platforms.
In Windows, click the Open existing whiteboard option or the “+” button, then select Import. On Web or iPad, select the Open or Import option.
Microsoft Whiteboard can convert WHITEBOARD files to .PNG images and .PDF documents. To do so, select the Settings menu (gear icon) and then click Export.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
